Install package on demand

Source: R/install_on_demand.R
install_on_demand.Rd

This function checks if a package is installed. If not, it asks the user if they want to install it. If the user agrees, it installs the package from CRAN.

Usage

install_on_demand(pkg, quiet = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

pkg

a character string with the name of the package

quiet

logical. If TRUE, suppresses messages during

...

additional arguments passed to install.packages

On this page
